WIZARD.DESCRIPTION: We want to guide your first steps creating apiary and other hives.
WIZARD.DESCRIPTION_2: Once you’re done you’ll be able to fly with your own wings

HIVE.TITLE: Create one hive
HIVE.DESCRIPTION: Later you’ll create as much hives as you want

FLOWER.TITLE: Add some flowers
FLOWER.DESCRIPTION: Later you’ll edit and complete this list

DONE.TITLE: You're done !
DONE.DESCRIPTION: Navigating the different pages you’ll find the following symbols

ICONS.ADD: Add an item (apiary, hive, sensor, flower)
